document.title: Managing editor, Russel Hirst presents copy of IJNS to John Norton Moore
document.abstract: John Norton Moore, renouned scholar of international law and co-founder of National Security Law Institute, receives copy of IINS from Dr. Hirst. Moore is the Walter L. Brown Professor of Law at the University of Virginia School of Law. He also directs the Universityâ€™s Center for National Security Law and the Center for Oceans Law & Policy. The author of 35 books, he is widely recognized as the founder of the field of national security law, and he has served numerous presidential appointments and top-level service positions. He is also a gold-medal weight lifter! (At National Security Law Institue, 2017).
